name: Copy Compass
author: Talooma (Nick Duncan)

sections.installation:
1. Once activated, click the “Copy Compass” link under your settings tabs
  2. Request an API key using the admin interface
  3. Insert the API key and you’re good to go!
sections.faq:
Where can I get an API key?

Simply log in to your WP Admin and click on “Copy Compass” under your settings tab. Follow the instructions to receive your unique API key.
sections.changelog:
1.4.2

  • Minor changes carried out to the client side.

1.4.1

  • Minor changes carried out to the client side.

1.4.0

  • Copy Compass now makes use of both sessions and files to return your data from the server. This should stop many users from receiving the “error opening file” error.
  • Fixed the bug that stopped the meta description of SEO Ultimate from being picked up

1.3.4

  • Improved handling of special characters when sending data across to the server
  • Fixed the bug where the meta description from Platinum SEO Pack was not displaying

1.3.3

  • Optimised controls for getting the API key
  • Optimised error reporting back to server for easier debugging

1.3.2

  • Attempted to fix the bug that stops users from receing an API key

1.3.1

  • Added compatibility for the SEO Ultimate Plugin.
  • Small, server-side changes to the algorithm were made.

1.3.0

  • An alert box will now be displayed on every admin page to notify the user that he/she needs to request an API key
  • Some minor code changes were carried out

1.2

  • Copy Compass now makes use of an API system

short_description: Copy Compass automatically analyses your posts or pages to SEO best practices.
